participant_1.background:
I married my high school sweetheart.
I need a soda with me at all times.
I have 3 kids.
I like the group the rolling stones.
I do not eat healthy.

participant_2.background:
I tend to work myself up.
I just want my voice to be heard.
My back hurts chronically.
I am an old soul.
I am passionate about a lot of things.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you for asking. How are you?
I am doing well, thank you. What do you do for fun?
I enjoy reading, writing, and spending time with my family.
I love reading too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Harry Potter series, The Hunger Games series, and the Percy Jackson series.
I have read the Harry Potter series and the Hunger Games series! They are both great. I haven't read the Percy Jackson series, but I have heard good things about it.
You should definitely read it! It's a great series. What do you do for work?
I am a teacher. I teach kindergarten.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I could never be a teacher. I don't think I have the patience for it.
It is a lot of fun, but it can also be challenging. I love working with kids and helping them learn.
That's great. I am glad that you enjoy your job.
Thank you. I am too. What about you? What do you do for work?
I am a writer. I write children's books.
That sounds like a very interesting job. I love children's books. I read them all the time to my students.
It is a lot of fun. I love coming up with new stories and characters.
I bet it is. I love reading stories to my students. They always get so excited when I read them a new book.
That's great. I love hearing kids laugh and get excited about books.
Me too. It's the best part of my job.
